title: Uganda: Museveni, IMF Director Discuss Uganda's Economic Growth,Tax Base Expansion
desc: President Museveni has hosted Abebe Aemro Selassie, Director of the African Department at the International Monetary Fund, at State House Entebbe, where the two discussed Uganda's economic performance and strategies to widen the country's tax base.

title: ECM Sensing Shapes Pancreatic Cancer Resistance
desc: Pancreatic cancer cells adjust autophagy based on extracellular matrix signals, switching between growth and drug resistance.

title: DOST launches iHubs in Pangasinan schools UDD, PPC to empower local ideas
desc: DOST officially unveiled two innovation hubs (iHubs) at the Universidad de Dagupan and the Pangasinan Polytechnic College during 2026 Regional Science and Technology Week for Region I.

title: Ghana: NLC Summons Tertiary Education Unions Over Ongoing Strike
desc: The National Labour Commission (NLC) has summoned all four tertiary education unions and their employers to appear before it to address the ongoing strike action in the country's higher education institutions.
